title.rendered: 2024-2025 School Budget & Board of Education Results

content.rendered:
Residents of the Saratoga Springs City School District approved the proposed $148,709,136 school budget for 2024-2025 by a vote of 3150 to 781. In addition, the bus bond proposition was approved by a vote of 3102 to 823. 

Three candidates were elected to the Board of Education. The Board of Education Election vote counts are listed below.  

  • Deb Amory – 2503 votes 
  • Matt Kopans – 2201 votes 
  • Connie Woytowich – 1923 votes 
  • Amanda Ellithorpe – 1794 votes 
  • Joe Sabanos  – 1425 vot

Read more about the 2024-2025 proposed budget.
